description:
What's going on with Qualcomm's Snapdragon X Elite 'Mac mini killer' Dev Kit?

I take a look at the current Windows on Arm landscape, and discuss what I think Microsoft and Qualcomm should do to make Snapdragon X truly 'Elite' among Arm platforms.

Some of the videos and resources I mentioned:

  - Qualcomm Dev Kit Announcement: https://www.qualcomm.com/news/releases/2024/05/qualcomm-accelerates-development-for-copilot--pcs-with-snapdrago
  - Qualcomm Dev Kit on Arrow: https://www.arrow.com/en/products/c8380-12c-mp-32g/thundercomm
  - Ampere Altra Dev Platform: https://www.ipi.wiki/products/ampere-altra-developer-platform?variant=42970872053922
  - Level1Techs Microsoft/Qualcomm Dev Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qKRmYW1D0S0
  - Box86 Compatibility List: https://box86.org/app/
  - ptitSeb's latest Box86 game demo video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eVWkcusaGAg
  - Portal 2 bug with 128-core CPUs: https://github.com/ValveSoftware/portal2/issues/367
  - Linux on Snapdragon X:
title: Windows Arm PCs could be SO much better
